snippet: The sale was the latest move in a continuing effort to shed assets unrelated to the company’s flagship newspaper.
abstract: New York Times Company sells its remaining stake in the Fenway Sports Group, owner of the Boston Red Sox; sale, which garners $63 million, is part of company's continuing effort to shed assets unrelated to its flagship newspaper.
lead_paragraph: The sale was the latest move in a continuing effort to shed assets unrelated to the company’s flagship newspaper.

headline.main: New York Times Company Sells Final Stake in Fenway Sports
headline.print_headline: New York Times Company Sells Final Stake in Fenway Sports
